text: Le ahli kitab galak keu gata Jimeung peugisa bak kaphe bagah Lheuh tameuiman beu tatem kaphe Jih saket ate gata ka leupah Sabab ka nyata gata nyang beuna Bit meunan teuma jih tapeumeuâ€˜ah Bek that tahitong pulang bak Tuhan Cit na urusan di jih ngon Allah Keubit roe Tuhan kuasa Neuh that Dumpeue cit meuhat kuasa Allah
